org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy
Interface IAeDeploymentContext

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAeDeploymentContainer
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAbstractDeploymentContext, AeDeploymentContainer, AeStandaloneDeploymentContext
public interface IAeDeploymentContext

Wraps information about a deployment and provides access to its resources.

Method Summary
 IAeDeploymentId getDeploymentId()
          Accessor for deployment id
 java.net.URL getDeploymentLocation()
          Point to the deployment location.
 java.io.InputStream getResourceAsStream(java.lang.String aResourceName)
          Access the named resource.
 java.lang.ClassLoader getResourceClassLoader()
          Return the deployment classloader.
 java.net.URL getResourceURL(java.lang.String aResourceName)
          Get the url for the context resource.
 java.lang.String getShortName()
          Short name of the deployment - the url resource without protocol and path info.
 java.net.URL getTempDeploymentLocation()
          If the deployment is copied to a staging/temp dir, this will return a url pointing to the location, otherwise null.
 

Method Detail

getDeploymentId

public IAeDeploymentId getDeploymentId()
Accessor for deployment id

getDeploymentLocation

public java.net.URL getDeploymentLocation()
Point to the deployment location.

getTempDeploymentLocation

public java.net.URL getTempDeploymentLocation()
If the deployment is copied to a staging/temp dir, this will return a url pointing to the location, otherwise null.

getShortName

public java.lang.String getShortName()
Short name of the deployment - the url resource without protocol and path info.

getResourceAsStream

public java.io.InputStream getResourceAsStream(java.lang.String aResourceName)
Access the named resource.

Parameters:
aResourceName -

getResourceURL

public java.net.URL getResourceURL(java.lang.String aResourceName)
Get the url for the context resource.

Parameters:
aResourceName -
Returns:
The url associated with the passed resource.

getResourceClassLoader

public java.lang.ClassLoader getResourceClassLoader()
Return the deployment classloader. This is the classloader that has access to the resources necessary for bpr deployments.
